DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial evaluate impact use internet-based checklist systematic assessment patient report respiratory complaint conventional assessment , without use checklist .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial evaluate impact use internet-based checklist systematic assessment patient report respiratory complaint conventional assessment , without use checklist . Study setting : emergency department relate acute evaluation outpatient clinic Inclusion criterion : 18 year age old ; patient present ED report cough dyspnea ; Exclusion criterion : acute respiratory failure ; SpO2 < 92 % ; sign hemodynamic respiratory instability ; possible concurrent diagnosis require immediate assessment ( e.g.. : acute coronary syndrome stroke ; ) Primary outcome : need reassessment ED hospitalization within 1 month index evaluation ( intervention ) . Secondary outcome : number complete blood count order index evaluation ; number diagnostic test order index evaluation ; Randomization : block 1:1 ; stratify gender age ( > 50 year old ) . Masking appllied : patient ; outcome assessor ; data analyst ;
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old ; patient present ED report cough dyspnea ; legally capable . Exclusion criterion : acute respiratory failure ; SpO2 < 92 % ; sign hemodynamic respiratory instability ; possible concurrent diagnosis require immediate assessment ( e.g.. : acute coronary syndrome stroke ; )
